title: 12 Days
description:
12 Days is a charming, quick card game twisting "Twelve Days of Christmas" into a festive bidding and set collection experience. It combines simple rules with nostalgic themes for engaging family fun.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Collect the most valuable set of Christmas gifts by the twelfth round.
- **Each Round:**
    - **Deal Gifts:** Gift cards (1-12) are dealt to players, corresponding to the round number.
    - **Play Day Card:** Secretly choose a "day" card (1-12) from hand to bid.
    - **Reveal & Award:** Lowest day card chooses a gift card, then the next lowest, distributing all gifts.
    - **Resolve Ties:** Ties are broken by previously won gift card values.
- **End Game:** After twelve rounds, all gift cards are distributed.
- **Winner:** Player with the highest total score from collected majorities of each gift card number.

title: 13 Dead End Drive
description:
**13 Dead End Drive** is a thrilling board game where players secretly manipulate characters within a treacherous mansion to be the last heir standing and inherit Aunt Agatha's fortune. It combines deduction, strategy, and dark humor on an iconic 3D board.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the last character remaining in the mansion.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Roll and Move:** Move any character using the die.
    - **Play Card:** Play a Portrait to reveal a controlled character, or a Trap card to activate a trap.
    - **Activate Trap:** If a character is near a trap and you have the card, activate it to eliminate them.
- **Winner:** The player controlling the last surviving character wins.

This edition features classic components for a delightful blend of strategic movement and mischievous trap-setting.

title: 5-Minute Dungeon
description:
5-Minute Dungeon is a chaotic, cooperative, real-time card game where players have just five minutes to defeat all monsters and the boss of a dungeon. It's a frantic experience that tests communication, quick thinking, and teamwork.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

**Goal:** Defeat five dungeon bosses within a strict five-minute time limit for each dungeon.

**Each Round:**
- **Draw Cards:** Draw resource and ability cards from your personal deck.
- **Play Cards:** Play cards to match symbols required by the current monster or obstacle.
- **Communicate:** Constantly communicate available cards and needs with teammates.
- **Defeat Challenges:** Once enough symbols are played, defeat the current monster/obstacle.

**End Game:** The team wins by defeating the fifth and final boss within the time limit.

**Winner:** The team wins or loses together.

title: A Place for All My Books
description:
**A Place for All My Books** is a charming, strategic board game where players organize books to create the most accomplished and aesthetically pleasing library. This cozy, puzzly experience is all about bringing order to your personal book collection.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Score the most points by strategically arranging books on your shelves based on color, genre, and achievements.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draft Books:** Select book tiles from a central market to add to your collection.
    *   **Place Books:** Immediately place drafted books onto your personal bookshelf board, observing placement rules.
    *   **Complete Goals:** Fulfill public or private objectives for immediate points or bonuses.
    *   **Manage Space:** Optimize limited shelf space to store valuable books efficiently.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest-scoring book collection wins.

title: Agatha Christie: Death on the Cards
description:
**Agatha Christie: Death on the Cards** is a cooperative deduction game with a hidden traitor, immersing players in a classic whodunit. Unmask the murderer among you before they escape, or risk being outsmarted by the killer secretly sabotaging the investigation.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Detectives aim to identify the murderer; the murderer aims to escape.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draw Cards:** Gain clue, suspect, or action cards.
    *   **Play Cards:** Reveal information or advance the investigation.
    *   **Deduce and Discuss:** Use communication to piece together the crime.
*   **End Game:** Detectives expose the murderer, or the murderer escapes.
*   **Winner:** Detectives win if the murderer is caught; the murderer wins if they escape.

This edition features compelling narrative and hidden traitor mechanics, perfect for fans of mystery and social deduction.

title: Alpujarras
description:
In Alpujarras, transform the Spanish landscape into a prosperous domain, utilizing unique irrigation systems. This Euro-style board game challenges players to efficiently manage resources and strategically expand influence.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
**Goal:** Accumulate the most victory points by cultivating crops, expanding influence, and fulfilling market demands.

**On Your Turn:**
- **Place Workers:** Deploy workers to gather resources like water, soil, and seeds.
- **Cultivate Fields:** Use resources to plant crops on your board and the main board.
- **Sell Crops:** Fulfill market demands for benefits or victory points.
- **Expand Influence:** Place markers for area majority bonuses and regional control.

**Winner:** The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins.

title: Amoebunnies
description:
Amoebunnies is a charming, asymmetrical board game where adorable amoeba-like bunnies race to restore their lands. Each of six unique Amoebunnies has distinct goals and abilities, offering a fresh strategic experience every time.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

-   **Goal:** Be the first player to complete your unique character's objective.
-   **On Your Turn:**
    -   **Move:** Use your character's unique movement capabilities.
    -   **Use Ability:** Activate your special Amoebunny ability.
    -   **Interact:** Maneuver your Amoebunny to interact with game elements.
-   **Winner:** The first player to successfully complete their individual character objective.

This edition features a delightful and competitive experience for players of all ages.
mechanics: Action / Event;Different Dice Movement;Move Through Deck;Race;Variable Player Powers;Variable Set-up

title: Apples to Apples
description:
Apples to Apples is a classic party game where players make humorous or fitting comparisons. It's a game of subjective judgment and creativity, perfect for lively gatherings and hilarious outcomes.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the first to collect a predetermined number of green "Description" cards.
*   **Each Round:**
    *   One player is the **Judge**, drawing a green adjective card.
    *   Other players secretly **choose** a red noun card from their hand that best matches or amuses the Judge.
    *   Players then **submit** their chosen red cards face down.
    *   The Judge **shuffles** and reveals the red cards, then **selects** their favorite.
*   **Winner:** The player whose red card was chosen wins the green card and becomes the new Judge.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when a player collects the target number of green cards.

This edition offers endless card combinations for high replayability and fresh laughs.

title: Art Society
description:
In Art Society, players become art collectors vying to create the most prestigious gallery by acquiring, arranging, and influencing the art market. This game blends strategic tile placement and set collection with an innovative trend-influencing mechanism.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Score the most victory points by curating your gallery, fulfilling secret objectives, and manipulating art trends.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Acquire Paintings:** Draft paintings from a market to your hand or gallery.
    *   **Place Paintings:** Place paintings on your gallery board, matching colors, styles, or artists for sets.
    *   **Influence Trends:** Take actions to shift the value of art styles or artists on a trend board.
    *   **Complete Objectives:** Fulfill secret objective cards for additional points.
*   **End Game:** The game ends after a set number of rounds or when a player fills their gallery.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest total score from their gallery, trend influence, and objectives.

title: Artistry
description:
In Artistry, players immerse themselves in the world of Art Nouveau, shaping patterns and masterpieces to etch their names in history. This abstract strategy game combines elegant mechanics with artistic expression.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

- **Goal:** Collect sets of art tiles to create stunning patterns and earn renown.
- **On Your Turn:** Draft tiles from a central display and strategically place them on your player board to complete patterns.
- **End Game:** The game ends after a set number of rounds or when a player meets a specific masterpiece objective.
- **Winner:** The player with the most renown points from completed patterns and masterpieces wins.

Artistry offers a beautiful and engaging experience for those who appreciate both strategy and aesthetics.

title: Artistry: Marvelous Mucha Mini Expansion
description:
Expand your Artistry game with the Marvelous Mucha mini-expansion, featuring the iconic Art Nouveau works of Alphonse Mucha. This expansion introduces new Master Artisan and Pattern cards, immersing players even deeper into the artistic world. Challenge your creativity and strategic thinking as you incorporate Mucha's masterful designs into your gameplay.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

- **Goal:** Unspecified (expands on the base game, Artistry).
- **On Your Turn:** Integrate new Master Artisan and Pattern cards into your game of Artistry.
- **End Game:** Unspecified (follows the base game's end conditions).
- **Winner:** Unspecified (follows the base game's victory conditions).

This mini-expansion enriches the Artistry experience by adding significant thematic depth and strategic variety with its unique card content.

title: Azul Mini
description:
Azul Mini brings the classic abstract strategy game to a portable format, challenging players to decorate the Royal Palace of Evora with ceramic tiles. It retains all the strategic depth of the original with enhanced travel features.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Score the most points by artfully placing colored tiles on your player board and creating patterns.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Factory Selection:** Choose all tiles of one color from a factory display or the center.
    *   **Row Placement:** Place chosen tiles into one row on your board—if filled, one tile moves to the wall, others to the "floor line" (negative points).
    *   **End of Round:** A round ends when displays are empty, then players score their walls.
*   **End Game:** The game ends after one player completes a horizontal row of 5 tiles on their wall.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest total score wins, after bonus points for rows, columns, and color sets.

This edition features plastic overlays and integrated scoring for convenient travel play.

title: Azul: Summer Pavilion
description:
Azul: Summer Pavilion invites players to become master artisans decorating the royal Summer Pavilion. This abstract strategy game offers new twists to the beloved Azul series, challenging players to meticulously plan and adapt their tile-drafting strategies.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Score the most points by strategically placing colorful tiles.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Draft Tiles:** Take all tiles of one color from a factory display or the center.
    - **Place Tiles:** Place tiles onto your board, using the current round's wild color.
    - **Complete Stars & Columns:** Earn immediate points for completing sections.
    - **Claim Bonus Tiles:** Gain extra tiles by surrounding pillars.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest final score.

title: Bibleopoly
description:
Bibleopoly reimagines classic real estate trading with a biblical theme, offering a family-friendly economic game with a distinct spiritual flavor. Players journey through biblical locations, accumulating wealth and properties within a faith-based context.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Acquire properties, collect offerings, build churches, and become the wealthiest player.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Roll the Dice:** Determine movement.
    *   **Move Your Token:** Advance clockwise.
    *   **Land on a Space:** Buy property, pay rent, draw cards, pay taxes, or go to penalty spaces.
    *   **Trade and Negotiate:** Exchange properties or assets between turns.
*   **Winner:** The last player remaining after others are bankrupt.
This edition offers a wholesome and engaging alternative to traditional economic board games.
publisher: Late for the Sky Production Company
mechanics: Auction / Bidding;Roll / Spin and Move;Set Collection;Trading

title: Biome
description:
Biome is a captivating tableau-building game where players construct diverse ecosystems. Strategically acquire and place flora and fauna cards, creating synergies to outmaneuver opponents.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

- **Goal:** Score the most victory points by creating the most biodiverse biome.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Play Card:** Play a creature, plant, or ability card into your biome.
    - **Trigger Effects:** Activate immediate or ongoing card effects.
    - **Acquire Cards:** Draw new cards from the market or deck.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest victory points wins.

title: Blokus
description:
Blokus is an abstract strategy game where players place polyomino pieces to claim territory on a board. Its simple rules hide deep tactical depth, offering accessible yet engaging spatial puzzles for all skill levels.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the player with the fewest unplayed pieces by placing as many as possible.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Start:** Play your first piece touching a corner square.
    - **Place Piece:** Subsequent pieces must touch a corner of one of your previously placed pieces.
    - **Corners Only:** Your pieces of the same color cannot touch along an edge, only at corners.
    - **Others:** Different colored pieces can touch along edges or corners.
- **End Game:** The game ends when no player can make a legal move.
- **Winner:** The player with the lowest score (sum of squares in unplaced pieces) wins. Placing all pieces gives a -20 bonus; placing the single square last gives a -5 bonus.

This edition features colorful polyomino pieces for a visually engaging experience.

title: Blueprints of Mad King Ludwig
description:
In *Blueprints of Mad King Ludwig*, players become architects, designing extravagant castle blueprints to impress the eccentric monarch. This roll-and-write game uniquely uses transparent sheets, focusing on strategic room placement and clever connections.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Draft and draw rooms to create a castle blueprint that scores the most points by satisfying Mad King Ludwig's requests.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draft a Room:** Choose a room card from those revealed.
    *   **Draw the Room:** Draw the room onto your transparent blueprint, placing it adjacent to existing rooms.
    *   **Connect & Score:** Connect same-type rooms for bonuses, aiming to fulfill public "King's Favors" and private "Bonus Cards."
    *   **Special Actions:** Utilize certain rooms or sections for additional advantages.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest score at the game's end.

This edition offers a refreshing take on castle-building, blending strategic planning and spatial puzzle-solving for high replayability.

title: Bluey: Keepy Uppy
description:
**Bluey: Keepy Uppy** is a lively, motorized action game bringing the beloved children's show to your tabletop. Players use character paddles to keep a balloon aloft, challenging their reflexes and steady hands in a fun, active experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
*   **Goal:** Be the last player with "balloon Pop" tokens.
*   **Each Round:**
    *   A motorized unit makes the balloon flip and spin unpredictably.
    *   **Bop** the balloon with your paddle when it approaches your section.
    *   Send the balloon back into the air and away from your hedge.
    *   If the balloon hits your hedge, you lose a "balloon Pop" token.
*   **Winner:** The last player remaining with "balloon Pop" tokens wins.

This engaging game captures the playful spirit of Bluey, offering simple rules and active interaction.

title: Botany
description:
Botany immerses players in 19th-century botanical exploration, competing as aspiring botanists to discover rare flora. Cultivate gardens and complete collections to earn the coveted title of Royal Botanist, blending strategic planning with adventure.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Become the Royal Botanist by earning the most triumph points.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Travel:** Move your botanist across a global map.
    *   **Collect Specimens:** Acquire plant specimens from your current region.
    *   **Cultivate Garden:** Fulfill objectives in your personal garden with collected specimens.
    *   **Utilize Character Ability:** Activate your unique botanist ability once per round.
    *   **Complete Collections:** Fulfill sets of specimens for triumph points and rewards.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most triumph points at the end of the game.

This edition features vibrant artwork and thematic elements, making plant discovery a memorable experience.

title: Botany: Festive Foliage
description:
Botany: Festive Foliage expands the garden-building game with a charming winter theme, introducing new mechanics and holiday cheer. Players cultivate a vibrant garden with festive plants and characters, blending strategic design with a relaxing experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

**Goal:** Create the most harmonious and appealing festive garden by arranging cards and completing achievements to maximize your score.

**On Your Turn:**
- **Draw Cards:** Replenish your hand with new plant, character, or garden feature cards.
- **Plant & Arrange:** Strategically add cards to your personal garden tableau, considering placement for scoring.
- **Activate Abilities:** Utilize special powers of Festive Characters or Garden Features for advantages.
- **Complete Objectives:** Work towards fulfilling unique festive objectives for end-game points.
**Winner:** The player with the highest festive score at the game's end wins.

This expansion offers a charming experience for new and veteran players, perfect for adding holiday cheer to your botanical collection.

title: Botany: Orchid Obsession
description:
Botany: Orchid Obsession expands the Botany board game, immersing players in the competitive Victorian "orchid craze." This expansion heightens the race to discover and claim the most coveted orchid specimens, adding new dynamics centered on swift acquisition.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

-   **Goal:** Be the most successful botanist by acquiring highly sought-after shared orchid specimen cards.
-   **On Your Turn:**
    -   **Observe:** Reveal new orchid specimen cards.
    -   **Acquire:** Use resources to claim newly revealed orchids.
    -   **Collect:** Add acquired orchids to your personal collection for scoring.
-   **Winner:** The player with the most victory points from their orchid collection wins.

title: Café Baras
description:
In Café Baras, players build a charming café, attracting diverse capybara clientele and transforming them into loyal regulars. This card-drafting game combines strategic planning with adorable artistry for a lighthearted yet engaging experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Accumulate the most victory points by satisfying customers, completing objectives, and designing a well-laid-out café.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draft Cards:** Select menu items, café upgrades, or customer cards from a central display.
    *   **Play Cards:** Add drafted cards to your café tableau.
    *   **Serve Customers:** Fulfill customer needs with menu items to earn loyalty and points.
    *   **Special Actions:** Utilize unique card or upgrade abilities to enhance your strategy.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest victory point total wins.

title: Calico
description:
Calico is a charming tile-laying game where players create the most appealing, cat-attracting quilt. This delightful puzzle balances various scoring objectives, offering surprising strategic depth within its gentle theme.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Score victory points by completing pattern goals, attracting cats, and collecting button sets.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Select Patch:** Choose one of two fabric patches from hand.
    *   **Place Patch:** Place it onto your personal quilt board.
    *   **Draw Patch:** Refill your hand to two patches from the bag.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when all quilts are filled with 22 patches.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest total score wins.

title: Call to Adventure
description:
Embark on an epic journey in `Call to Adventure`, a captivating tabletop game where players craft their unique hero's story. Through challenges and choices, develop your character, acquire powerful traits, and face adversaries to become the most legendary hero. This game blends narrative richness with engaging card-drafting and rune-casting mechanics.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Become the most legendary hero by accumulating the most destiny points.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draft Cards:** Choose character/challenge cards for your tableau.
    *   **Attempt Challenges:** Use engraved runes (abilities) on character cards—cast custom runes aiming to match/exceed difficulty.
    *   **Gain Traits:** Successfully completing challenges earns new trait cards to develop your hero.
    *   **Advance Your Story:** Collect specific cards to progress your story path, unlocking powerful abilities.
*   **End Game:** The game concludes when a player completes their third story card, or a set number of character cards are played.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest destiny points.
mechanics: Card Drafting;Dice Rolling;Set Collection;Storytelling;Variable Player Powers

title: Call to Adventure: Epic Origins
description:
**Call to Adventure: Epic Origins** is a fantasy game where players create legendary heroes, charting their destinies from humble beginnings to epic sagas. This standalone sequel plunges you into myth and magic, crafting unique characters through narrative choices.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Create the most heroic character by collecting experience and fulfilling destiny.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draw Cards:** Draw Character or Destiny cards to expand choices.
    *   **Attempt Challenges:** Roll custom runes; success or failure shapes your hero's story and grants abilities.
    *   **Acquire Traits and Destiny:** Gain trait cards for abilities and acquire destiny cards for end-game scoring.
    *   **Use Abilities:** Employ talents to influence rolls or mitigate failures.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest experience total wins.
*   This edition offers a deeply immersive and customizable experience with stunning artwork.
mechanics: Card Drafting;Dice Rolling;Narrative Choice / Storytelling;Set Collection

title: Carcassonne Big Box 6
description:
Carcassonne Big Box 6 is a classic tile-placement game where players collectively build a medieval landscape. This compilation includes the base game and popular expansions, offering diverse strategic options and high replayability.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Score the most victory points by completing features on the shared landscape.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draw & Place Tile:** Draw a landscape tile and place it to match existing features.
    *   **Place Meeple:** Optionally place a meeple on an empty feature (road, city, monastery, or field) of your new tile.
    *   **Score Completed Features:** Score points immediately for completed features with your meeples, then return them.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when the last tile is placed.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most points after final scoring wins.

This Big Box consolidates core Carcassonne gameplay with significant expansion content for a comprehensive experience.

title: Cards Christians Like
description:
Cards Christians Like is a hilarious party game where players complete Christian-themed prompts with funny and relatable responses. It's perfect for youth groups or family gatherings, bringing laughter to believers with a sense of humor.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the first player to collect seven blue prompt cards.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Card Czar:** Draws and reads a blue prompt card.
    *   **Respond:** Other players secretly choose a white response card from their hand.
    *   **Submit:** Players submit cards face down to the Czar.
    *   **Choose:** Czar shuffles, reads combinations, and picks the funniest response.
*   **Winner:** The player whose white card was chosen earns the blue prompt card.
*   **End Game:** The first player to collect seven blue prompt cards wins.

This edition features a unique blend of humor and shared Christian experience for endless laughter.

title: Cards Christians Like: The Expansion Box Vol. 1
description:
Cards Christians Like: The Expansion Box Vol. 1 injects irreverent humor and new content into the popular party game. It amplifies the core experience, delving deeper into quirky and comical aspects of Christian culture for more laugh-out-loud moments.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Create the funniest or most fitting card combinations to a prompt, as judged by the designated Judge.
- **Each Round:**
    - A Judge reads a black "Prompt" card aloud.
    - Other players secretly choose a white "Answer" card from their hand.
    - Players submit cards face down to the Judge.
    - The Judge shuffles, reads combinations, and selects their favorite.
- **Winner:** The player with the most black cards (won rounds) at the end of the game.

This expansion adds 300 new cards for increased replayability and extended gameplay.

title: Cascadia
description:
Cascadia is a captivating tile-laying and token-drafting game where players build harmonious ecosystems in the Pacific Northwest. Its elegant mechanics and beautiful art create a relaxing yet engaging puzzle with high replayability.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Score the most points by creating expansive habitats and strategic wildlife patterns.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Draft a Tile and Token:** Choose one habitat tile and a corresponding wildlife token from available pairs.
    - **Place the Habitat Tile:** Add the chosen habitat tile adjacent to your ecosystem.
    - **Place the Wildlife Token:** Place the token onto a matching habitat tile, considering scoring.
    - **Refill the Market:** Replenish the chosen pair for the next player.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest total score wins.

This edition features stunning artwork that vividly brings the Pacific Northwest to life.

title: Cat Nap
description:
In *Cat Nap*, players are rival cats competing for the coziest quilt territory. This tile-laying game blends spatial puzzling with lighthearted competition as you strategically place cat-shaped tiles to expand your feline empire.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Create the largest and most valuable cat territories on the quilt.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Place a Tile:** Select a cat-shaped tile from your hand or a common supply.
    *   **Extend Your Cat:** Place tiles to extend existing cat parts or form new cat faces.
    *   **Complete a Cat:** Finish a full cat (head, body, tail) to claim a color.
    *   **Claim Discarded Tiles:** Use claimed colors to draw specific tiles from the discard pile.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when the quilt board is filled or a set number of rounds/tiles are played.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most victory points from completed cats and claimed territories wins.

The game promises a unique and engaging experience with its adorable theme and straightforward yet strategic gameplay, creating a purr-fect puzzle each time.

title: CATAN
description:
Catan places players in the role of settlers colonizing a remote island, gathering resources, and building their civilization. It's a foundational game blending accessible rules with deep strategic choices, defining the modern board game landscape.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the first player to reach 10 Victory Points (VPs).
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Roll Dice:** Determine which hexes produce resources for all players.
    *   **Collect Resources:** Players with buildings adjacent to producing hexes collect resource cards.
    *   **Trade:** Exchange resources with other players or the bank.
    *   **Build:** Spend resources to build Roads, Settlements, Cities, or buy Development Cards.
    *   **Move Robber (on a 7):** If a 7 is rolled, discard half cards if over 7, then move the robber to a hex, steal a resource, and block production.
*   **Winner:** The first player to reach 10 VPs wins.

This classic edition provides all the necessary components for countless hours of strategic island development.
mechanics: Dice Rolling;Hexagon Grid;Income;Modular Board;Negotiation;Player Elimination;Network and Route Building;Race;Trading;Variable Set-up

title: Catan Dice Game
description:
Catan Dice Game is a portable, fast-paced dice-rolling adaptation of the classic Catan, offering resource gathering and building without extensive setup. It's perfect for a quicker Catan experience or dice game enthusiasts seeking a blend of luck and strategy.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the first player to achieve 10 victory points.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Roll Dice:** Roll six resource dice up to three times, keeping dice.
    *   **Acquire Resources:** Collect brick, lumber, wool, grain, ore, or gold resources from dice.
    *   **Build Structures:** Use resources to build roads, settlements, cities, or knights on your scoresheet.
        *   — **Roads:** Cost brick and lumber.
        *   — **Settlements:** Cost brick, lumber, wool, grain.
        *   — **Cities:** Upgrade settlements, cost 2 grain, 3 ore.
        *   — **Knights:** Cost wool, grain, ore.
    *   **Wildcard Gold:** Gold can substitute for any resource.
*   **Winner:** The player who first reaches 10 victory points wins immediately.

This edition features individual player boards that provide a satisfying element of progression as you build your Catan landscape.

title: CATAN: Cities & Knights
description:
CATAN: Cities & Knights deepens the classic CATAN experience with city development, knightly defense, and a complex commodity market. Players must expand, acquire resources, and protect their civilizations from barbarians to achieve prosperity.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the first player to reach 13 victory points through various avenues including city improvements and knight strength.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Roll Dice:** Roll production and event dice – determines resource production, barbarian movement, and city growth.
    - **Collect Resources & Commodities:** Collect resources and commodities from upgraded cities.
    - **Trade:** Trade resources/commodities with players or the bank.
    - **Build/Act:**
        - **Build Roads, Settlements, City Walls:** Expand and protect your hand.
        - **Upgrade Cities:** Use commodities to advance on Trade, Politics, or Science tracks for abilities and points.
        - **Recruit/Activate Knights:** Use wool/ore to recruit, grain to activate knights for defense or robber movement.
        - **Play Progress Cards:** Purchase and play powerful development cards.
- **Winner:** The first player to reach 13 victory points on their turn.

This expansion enhances CATAN with more strategic choices and replayability through commodities, knight management, and city development tracks.
mechanics: Dice Rolling;Trading;Hand Management;Route/Network Building;Modular Board;Set Collection

title: Catan: Cities & Knights – Legend of the Conquerors
description:
*Catan: Cities & Knights – Legend of the Conquerors* expands classic Catan with a narrative-driven campaign, where players defend the island from barbarians while pursuing individual prosperity. This expansion adds cooperative and competitive elements to resource management.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Develop your civilization, repel barbarians, and score the most victory points across a multi-chapter campaign.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Roll Dice:** Determine resource production.
    *   **Trade:** Exchange resources with players or the bank.
    *   **Build/Upgrade:** Erect buildings, upgrade cities for progress cards, or recruit knights.
    *   **Play Progress Cards:** Utilize powerful abilities.
    *   **Fight Barbarians:** Deploy knights to collectively defend Catan.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most victory points after the campaign concludes wins.

This edition features a story-rich campaign, enhancing the original *Cities & Knights* experience.

title: CATAN: Seafarers
description:
**CATAN: Seafarers** brings high-seas adventure to the classic game of CATAN, introducing exploration and maritime trade. Players discover new islands and expand their networks across vast oceans, adding strategic depth and replayability.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the first to reach a set number of victory points, typically by building and expanding.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Roll Dice:** Determine which resource hexes produce.
    - **Resource Collection:** Players collect resources from activated hexes.
    - **Trade:** Exchange resources with other players or via harbors.
    - **Build:** Spend resources to build roads, settlements, cities, ships, or development cards.
        - Ships— Extend trade routes across water, connecting to new islands.
- **Winner:** The first player to reach the predetermined victory point total.

title: Chai
description:
In "Chai," 1-5 players become tea merchants, crafting perfect blends for customers. This beautifully illustrated game blends set collection, hand management, and economic decisions for a relaxing yet engaging experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

**Goal:** Earn the most victory points by fulfilling customer orders, collecting coins, and purchasing add-ons.
**On Your Turn:**
- **Visit the Market:** Gain two ingredient tokens from a stall, or one ingredient of choice, or draw a tea blend card.
- **Reserve a Customer:** Take a customer card to fulfill.
- **Purchase Add-ons:** Acquire special abilities or bonus components.
**End Game:** The game concludes after a set number of customer cards are fulfilled.
**Winner:** The player with the highest total score from fulfilled orders, coins, and add-on bonuses wins.

This retail edition offers a charming and accessible gaming experience, perfect for families and casual gamers.

title: Chickapig
description:
Chickapig is a charming, strategic race game combining chess-like movement with hay bale placement and unpredictable cow movements. It offers a delightful and engaging experience for families and casual gamers with its unique theme and accessible rules.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the first to move all four of your chickapigs to your goal area.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Move a Chickapig:** Move one chickapig in a straight line until it hits an obstacle.
    - **Draw a Card:** Draw a Daisy card (place a hay bale) or a Poop card (move the cow).
    - **Place Hay Bales (Daisy Card):** Place a hay bale on any empty space as an obstacle.
    - **Move the Cow (Poop Card):** Move the cow one space; if it lands on a chickapig, that chickapig returns to start.
- **Winner:** The first player to get all four chickapigs into their designated goal zone.

title: Chronicles of Crime
description:
Chronicles of Crime is a cooperative crime-solving board game that merges physical components with a digital app, creating an immersive detective experience. Players race against time, using "Scan & Play" technology to uncover clues and interact with the game world, leading to dynamic narratives.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Solve criminal cases by identifying the culprit, motive, and weapon and answering questions accurately within a time limit.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Travel to a Location:** Scan a card to move; the app describes the scene and available actions.
    *   **Examine a Crime Scene:** Use "Vision" cards and the app to explore 3D scenes for hidden clues.
    *   **Question Characters:** Scan character and item cards to ask questions and gain leads.
    *   **Analyze Evidence:** Scan item cards for expert analysis and insights.
    *   **Seek Help:** Visit experts or locations for specific information.
*   **Winner:** Players win by accurately answering case questions, with speed contributing to the final score.

This edition uniquely blends board game mechanics with digital interactivity for an evolving narrative and deeply immersive detective experience.
mechanics: Cooperative Game;Deduction;Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game;Variable Set-up;Augmented Reality;Storytelling

title: Codenames
description:
Codenames is a highly acclaimed word association game where two teams race to identify their secret agents. It blends deduction, clever wordplay, and risk-taking, perfect for parties or casual game nights.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the first team to contact all your secret agents on the table.
*   **Each Round:**
    *   **Spymaster chooses:** One player on each team gives a one-word clue and a number.
    *   **Clue relates:** The clue points to multiple of their team's secret words.
    *   **Teammates guess:** Field Operatives discuss and point to word cards matching the clue.
    *   **Reveal card:** Chosen word is covered, revealing if it's an agent, bystander, or assassin.
*   **Winner:** The first team to identify all their agents wins, unless they find the assassin, in which case they immediately lose.

title: Codenames: Pictures
description:
Codenames: Pictures is a captivating party game where two teams race to identify their secret agents from a grid of abstract images. This visual twist challenges players to think creatively, linking diverse pictures with a single, carefully chosen clue. It’s a game of deduction and clever communication.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the first team to identify all your secret agent pictures, avoiding the assassin.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Spymaster gives clue:** A Spymaster provides a one-word clue and a number (e.g., "Food, 2").
    - **Operatives guess:** Teammates point to pictures they think match the clue.
    - **Reveal:** Correct guesses mean another guess; incorrect guesses end the turn.
    - **Assassin:** Guessing the assassin loses the game immediately.
- **Winner:** The team that identifies all their agents or whose opponent selects the assassin.

This edition features unique, evocative art for a fresh take on the beloved Codenames formula.

title: Coffee Rush
description:
Become a top barista in *Coffee Rush*, a fast-paced game of strategic movement and resource management. Fulfill customer orders to earn stars and build your coffee shop's reputation.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Accumulate the most stars by completing customer orders.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Move Your Barista:** Move orthogonally on the ingredient board.
    *   **Collect Ingredients:** Gather ingredient tokens from spaces moved through and landed on.
    *   **Fulfill Orders:** Complete customer order cards with collected ingredients to earn stars.
    *   **Draw New Orders:** Replenish your hand with new customer orders.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when a set number of orders are completed or stars are reached.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most stars is the champion.

title: Compania
description:
Compania is an economic engine-building game where players establish the richest company in the fantastical world of Factoria. It combines strategic planning with tactical dice manipulation for a rewarding experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Become the wealthiest company in Factoria by accumulating wealth and reputation.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Roll or Use Dice:** Generate action points or resources.
    *   **Take Actions:** Choose to — Gather Resources, Produce Goods, Sell Goods, Invest in Upgrades, Recruit Workers.
    *   **Manage Company Board:** Optimize production chains and action efficiency.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest total score from wealth, assets, and bonus points.

title: Connecting Flights
description:
Connecting Flights is an economic board game where players build profitable airline networks, strategically expanding routes and upgrading planes to dominate the skies.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Earn the most money by building an efficient and profitable airline network.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Acquire:** Purchase new aircraft or airport gates.
    - **Establish:** Connect cities by creating flight routes.
    - **Upgrade:** Improve planes or airport facilities.
    - **Adapt:** Respond to changing market demands.
- **Winner:** The player with the most accumulated wealth at the game's end.

title: Cover Your Cookies
description:
**Cover Your Cookies** is a charming card game where players collect valuable cookie stacks, offering a sweet, family-friendly spin on a beloved set-collection and "take that" experience. Guard your cookie fortunes from envious opponents in this delightful strategic game.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the player with the most valuable stack of matched cookie pairs.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draw a Card:** Begin by drawing one card.
    *   **Make a Pair:** Play matching cookie cards from your hand to start or add to a "batch" in your stack.
    *   **Steal Cookies:** Play a matching cookie card or "Mixer" card to steal another player's top cookie batch.
    *   **Defend Your Cookies:** Play a matching cookie card or "Club Collector" card to defend against a steal.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when the draw pile is exhausted and no more plays can be made.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest total value of cookie stacks wins.

title: Cozy Cat Cafe
description:
Cozy Cat Cafe is a delightful tile-laying game where players create the most inviting cat cafe. Attract feline friends and discerning customers by strategically placing cats and decor, building a charming and aesthetically pleasing space. This game offers a relaxing yet thought-provoking experience for cat lovers.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
-   **Goal:** Attract the most cats and create the cafe with the highest ambiance score.
-   **On Your Turn:**
    -   **Draw Tiles:** Take tiles from the bag/display, representing cats, food, or decor.
    -   **Place a Tile:** Place a tile onto your cafe board, following placement rules.
    -   **Attract Cats/Score Points:** Complete patterns or fulfill cat preferences to attract new cats or earn ambiance points.
    -   **Activate Abilities:** Use special abilities from tiles or completed patterns for bonus actions.
-   **End Game:** The game ends after a set number of rounds or when a player reaches a specific number of cats/ambiance.
-   **Winner:** The player with the most ambiance points wins.
mechanics: Chaining;Command Cards;End Game Bonuses;Pattern Recognition;Solo / Solitaire Game

title: Creature Comforts (Kickstarter Edition)
description:
In *Creature Comforts*, forest creatures prepare their dens for winter by gathering resources and crafting cozy items. This charming worker placement and dice rolling game blends strategic decision-making with heartwarming aesthetics.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Accumulate the most Comfort Tokens by crafting various comforts.
*   **Each Round:**
    *   **Place Workers:** Simultaneously place meeples on action spaces for resources or dice opportunities.
    *   **Roll and Assign Dice:** Roll personal dice and assign them to worker spaces to activate them.
    *   **Gather Resources:** Collect resources (wood, berries, fabric, etc.) based on activated spaces and dice.
    *   **Craft Comforts:** Spend resources to craft "Comfort" cards, earning victory points.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most Comfort Tokens after eight rounds wins.

This Kickstarter Edition features delightful components for a cozy game night experience.

title: Critter Kitchen: Deluxe Edition
description:
Critter Kitchen: Deluxe Edition transports 1-7 players to Bistro Bay's Restaurant Week, challenging them to create the best dishes and impress a celebrity food critic. This game blends strategic chef placement, resource management, and deduction for a flavorful culinary experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

- **Goal:** Earn the most stars by completing food challenges and crafting an epic meal.
- **Each Round:**
    - **Deploy Chefs:** Secretly assign three chefs to city locations based on abilities.
    - **Gather Ingredients:** Collect ingredients from the dynamic market.
    - **Collect Rumors:** Gain clues about the critic's hidden preferences.
    - **Complete Challenges:** Fulfill food requirements to earn stars.
- **End Game:** Craft an ultimate meal for the celebrity critic based on their preferences.
- **Winner:** Player with the most stars after 7 rounds wins.

The Deluxe Edition includes upgraded components and additional content.

title: Diced Veggies
description:
Diced Veggies is a delightful dice-rolling game where players become chefs, chopping veggies to fulfill recipe requests. This refreshing take on set collection combines luck and tactical decision-making, perfect for families and casual gamers. It’s a race to collect ingredients and become the most renowned chef!

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Complete recipe cards by collecting required vegetable dice to earn the most points.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Roll the Dice:** Roll a set of colorful vegetable dice.
    - **Choose Dice:** Select needed dice for a recipe card; re-roll others.
    - **Re-roll (Optional):** Re-roll unkept dice, but beware of busting.
    - **Complete Recipes:** Fulfill a recipe card to earn its points.
    - **Claim Hype Cards (Optional):** Fulfill conditions for bonus points or abilities.
- **End Game:** The game ends after a set number of recipes are completed or a score threshold is met.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest total score wins.

title: Dinosaur Island
description:
Dinosaur Island is a thrilling board game where players compete to build the most exciting dinosaur theme park. Recruit specialists, geneticists, and even veterinarians to create prehistoric wonders and manage the lurking danger of rampaging dinosaurs. It's a vibrant blend of resource management, worker placement, and set collection with a dash of risk.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Earn the most victory points by creating an exciting park with cloned dinosaurs and attractions.
*   **Each Round:**
    *   **Market Phase:** Acquire DNA, specialists, or park upgrades.
    *   **Worker Placement Phase:** Place scientists to gain DNA, build attractions, or boost security.
    *   **Dinosaur Cloning Phase:** Spend DNA to clone dinosaurs, increasing Excitement and Threat.
    *   **Park Management Phase:** Earn money from visitors, but ensure security or risk casualties.
*   **End Game:** The game ends after a set number of rounds or when objective conditions are met.
*   **Winner:** The player with the most victory points wins.

This Deluxe Edition comes with premium components, bringing your dinosaur park to life.

title: Disney Eye Found It!
description:
Embark on a magical hidden object adventure through beloved Disney realms in Disney Eye Found It! This cooperative game invites players to explore expansive boards brimming with iconic characters and hidden treasures, fostering observation skills for all ages.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Reach Cinderella's Castle before the mischievous "péter" on the clock spinner completes its journey.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Spin the Spinner:** Determines if you move or search.
    - **Move:** Advance your pawn 1-3 spaces along the path.
    - **Find It:** Draw a card, and all players simultaneously search for the depicted item.
    - **Advance Péter:** Each time a "Find It" card is drawn, "péter" moves on the clock.
- **Winner:** All players win if everyone reaches Cinderella's Castle before "péter" finishes its rotation.

This edition features stunning artwork and familiar Disney settings for an immersive hidden object experience.

title: Drinks & Daggers
description:
Drinks & Daggers is a cooperative card game where players become adventurers inspired by the *Greetings, Adventurers!* podcast. Players choose unique character decks and work together to defeat a villain, with an optional "drinking" mechanic adding strategic depth.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Cooperatively defeat the villain before the party is overwhelmed.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Play Cards:** Attack the villain, defend allies, or activate abilities.
    - **Activate Powers:** Use unique character powers, often by "giving a drink" (or token) to an ally.
    - **Manage Hand:** Strategically decide when to use powerful abilities.
- **Winner:** The team wins if the villain is defeated; otherwise, the villain wins.
mechanics: Cooperative Game;Hand Management;Role Playing;Variable Player Powers

title: Drinks & Daggers: Expansion – Allies
description:
Drinks & Daggers: Allies is a cooperative card game expanding the base game with new heroes and a boss, bringing the "Greetings Adventurers" podcast to life. Players battle RPG villains and endure drinking challenges in a humorous fantasy adventure.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Cooperatively defeat the boss, Finnekan.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Draw Cards:** Replenish your hand with action, attack, or defense cards.
    - **Play Cards:** Attack enemies, heal, or use special abilities.
    - **Drink Card Effect:** Resolve drinking challenges from certain cards or events.
    - **Resolve Boss Actions:** The boss performs actions, attacking heroes or creating events.
- **End Game:** Players win by defeating Finnekan; players lose if all heroes are defeated.
- **Winner:** All players win or lose together.
mechanics: Cooperative Game;Hand Management;Role Playing;Variable Player Powers

title: Dungeon Royale
description:
Dungeon Royale is a competitive dungeon crawler where players explore a dynamic, modular dungeon to collect treasure and defeat monsters. Its blend of classic themes and strategic simultaneous action selection creates a thrilling experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Accumulate the most treasure and defeat monsters.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Simultaneous Action Selection:** Secretly choose an action tile (move, attack, search, ability).
    - **Reveal and Resolve:** Reveal actions and resolve them in order (e.g., by initiative).
    - **Explore and Collect:** Move across the dungeon, revealing new tiles, encountering monsters or treasure.
    - **Combat:** Engage in dice-rolling combat with monsters, using character stats and items.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest total score from treasure, defeated monsters, and objectives.
mechanics: Grid Movement;Hand Management;Pick-up and Deliver;Set Collection;Simultaneous Action Selection;Storytelling

title: Dust in the Wings
description:
Dust in the Wings is an enchanting board game where 2-4 players capture exquisite butterfly photographs in a vibrant meadow. This strategic set collection game offers a serene yet engaging experience for families and casual gamers.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Score the most points by collecting butterfly sets and achieving photography bonuses.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Move your photographer:** Move your pawn across the meadow board to a location.
    - **Collect butterfly cards:** Take available butterfly cards from your landed location.
    - **Complete sets:** Form sets of matching butterflies or specific color combinations.
    - **Utilize special actions:** Trigger special abilities from spaces or cards.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest score wins.

title: Dutch Blitz
description:
Dutch Blitz is a fast-paced, energetic card game blending solitaire with a multi-player race. Players quickly empty their blitz pile by playing cards numerically and by color onto a central area, making for competitive fun.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the first to empty your 10-card blitz pile.
- **Each Round:** Played simultaneously and continuously
  - **Start Dutch Piles:** Play a "1" to start a central pile—build from 1 to 10 in matching colors.
  - **Play from Post Piles:** Play the top card of your three post piles onto Dutch piles.
  - **Play from Wood Pile:** Flip three cards from your deck; play the visible card if it fits.
  - **Play from Blitz Pile:** Continuously play the top card from your blitz pile onto Dutch piles.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest score after multiple rounds (first to 75 points usually wins).

title: Emberleaf
description:
Emberleaf is a captivating medium-heavy strategy game for 1-5 players, blending resource management, area control, and set collection. Players unite heroes to reclaim a sacred forest from blight, set in a charming fantasy world of determined creatures.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

**Goal:** Accumulate the most Victory Points (VPs) by reclaiming forest regions, completing contracts, and constructing buildings.

**On Your Turn:**
- **Gather Resources:** Collect essential resources from controlled regions.
- **Deploy Heroes:** Recruit and strategically place heroes with special abilities to reclaim blighted areas.
- **Complete Contracts:** Fulfill contracts for immediate rewards and VPs by gathering resources or controlling regions.
- **Construct Buildings:** Erect buildings for passive abilities, production bonuses, or scoring opportunities.

**Winner:** The player with the highest Victory Point total wins.

title: Endearment
description:
**Endearment** transports players to Regency England, where iconic heroines pursue love and social standing. This game blends strategic decision-making with a charming narrative, encapsulating the allure of a Jane Austen novel.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Achieve the greatest "Endearment" by securing a desirable marriage and accumulating bonus points.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Town Actions:** Visit the Town to – Gain Persuasion – Purchase Dresses – Invite/Search for Characters.
    - **Visiting Settings:** Move your heroine to various Settings on the board.
    - **Interacting with Characters:** Build relationships and trigger events at Settings.
- **End Game:** After engagements or marriages occur, the current round finishes and "Endearment" scores are tallied.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest "Endearment" from marriage and bonus points.

title: Everdell
description:
Everdell is a charming worker placement and tableau-building game where players establish bustling cities for forest critters. With enchanting aesthetics and strategic depth, gather resources, recruit critters, and construct buildings to create the most prosperous woodland civilization.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Accumulate the most victory points by the end of the fourth season.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Place a Worker:** Place a worker to gather resources, draw cards, or take actions.
    - **Play a Card:** Pay resources to play Critter or Construction cards from your hand or the Meadow.
    - **Prepare for Season:** Retrieve workers, gain new workers, and trigger seasonal abilities.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest victory point total wins.

This edition features stunning artwork and intricate card synergies, offering both strategic depth and thematic charm.

title: Everdell Duo
description:
Everdell Duo transports players to the enchanting Everdell valley, a serene world where woodland critters build flourishing communities. This two-player re-implementation of the acclaimed Everdell offers a streamlined yet deeply strategic engine-building experience. Players compete to establish the most prosperous city through resource gathering and tactical card play.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Accumulate the most victory points by the end of the game.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Place a Worker:** Place a worker on the board to gather resources, draw cards, or trigger abilities.
    - **Play a Card:** Spend resources to play a critter or construction card into your city.
    - **Prepare for Season:** Pass for the season, retrieve workers, advance to the next season, and gain bonuses.
- **End Game:** The game concludes after the "Autumn/Fall" season.
- **Winner:** The player with the most victory points wins.

title: Everdell Emerland
description:
Journey to Emerland, a vibrant jungle region in the Everdell Valley, where players build bustling cities. This standalone game combines familiar Everdell mechanics with new twists for fresh strategic opportunities.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Establish the most prosperous jungle city by accumulating the most victory points.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Place a Worker:** Gather resources, draw cards, or trigger special actions.
    - **Play a Card:** Pay resources to play a Construction or Critter card into your city.
- **Winner:** The player with the most victory points at the end of the final season.

This edition features charming artwork and engaging gameplay, perfect for both new and returning Everdell players.
mechanics: Hand Management;Open Drafting;Set Collection;Worker Placement;Tableau Building

title: Everdell Farshore
description:
Everdell Farshore is a standalone worker placement and tableau-building game set in the charming Everdell universe, exploring uncharted seaside locations. Players establish thriving coastal settlements, utilizing new mechanics and unique resources like seastones.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Build the most prosperous harbor city by constructing buildings and inviting critters.
- **On Your Turn:**
  - **Place a Worker:** Send a critter to a location to gain resources, draw cards, or activate abilities.
  - **Play a Card:** Spend resources to add Critter or Construction cards to your city tableau.
- **End Game:** After four seasons, once all players have passed for the final season.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest total score from cards, objectives, and bonuses.

This edition features charming artwork and critter meeples in sailing ships, enhancing the maritime adventure.

title: Everdell Silverfrost
description:
Explore Silverfrost, a new standalone Everdell adventure set beyond the familiar valley, blending familiar mechanics with exciting twists. Discover uncharted territories, unique critters, and build thriving civilizations in a land shaped by harsh winters and burgeoning springs.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Establish the most successful civilization in Silverfrost by accumulating victory points.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Place a Worker:** Assign a worker to a board location to gain resources, draw cards, or perform special actions.
    - **Play a Card:** Play a Critter or Construction card from your hand into your city, spending resources.
    - **Prepare for the Next Season:** Retrieve workers, potentially gain seasonal bonuses, and progress through the game.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest total victory points after four seasons wins.
mechanics: Worker Placement;Set Collection;Card Drafting;Hand Management;Resource Management

title: Exploding Kittens
description:
Exploding Kittens is a whimsical, strategic, kitty-powered version of Russian Roulette where players try to avoid drawing the dreaded Exploding Kitten. This fast-paced card game combines humor, strategy, and a dash of absurdity for an explosive experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Be the last player remaining who hasn't drawn an Exploding Kitten.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Play Cards:** Play any number of cards for various effects—-peek, force draws, skip turns.
    *   **Draw a Card:** You must draw one card, risking an Exploding Kitten.
*   **Winner:** The last player who has not exploded wins the game.

This edition features hilarious illustrations by The Oatmeal and is perfect for quick, entertaining game nights.
mechanics: Hand Management;Player Elimination;Push Your Luck;Set Collection;Take That

title: FaeKin
description:
FaeKin is a social deduction game set in a mystical realm of warring Fae courts, where players uncover hidden identities, engage in secret duels, and execute dramatic reveals. It offers intense player interaction and strategic bluffing, making each round a thrilling experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Uncover hidden identities and affiliations to Fae courts, eliminate rivals, or fulfill secret objectives.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Perform an action:** Challenge a player, use a Fae ability, or gather information.
    *   **Deduce and Bluff:** Observe behavior to piece together roles while maintaining your own identity.
    *   **Initiate Duels/Reveals:** Engage in duels or force reveals to expose opponents or achieve objectives.
*   **Winner:** The player or court that best navigates deceit and achieves their goals.
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing;Deduction;Hidden Roles;Negotiation;Roles with Asymmetric Information

title: Fairy Tile
description:
Fairy Tile is a charming game where players cooperatively build a fantastical land through tile-laying and guide its inhabitants. Uniquely, players become storytellers, completing narrative objectives to win.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Be the first to complete three "story pages" by moving characters and expanding the kingdom.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Develop the Kingdom:** Play a new land tile next to an existing one.
    - **Move a Character:** Move the Knight, Princess, or Dragon based on their unique movement rules.
    - **Complete a Story Page:** If conditions on a story page are met, complete it and draw a new one.
- **Winner:** The player who completes their third story page wins immediately.

title: Fiction
description:
Fiction is a cooperative word deduction game where players guess a secret literary word while a "Lie-brarian" tries to mislead them. This party game blends elements of Codenames and Mysterium, offering a unique challenge where not all clues are what they seem.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Correctly guess the secret literary word as a team before time runs out.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Cipher Chooses Clues:** The Cipher receives a secret word and clue cards, then chooses clues to guide guessers.
    - **Lie-brarian Adds False Clue:** The Lie-brarian adds a misleading clue card.
    - **Guessers Discuss:** Guessing players discuss clues and decide on a word.
    - **Guess Reveals:** If correct, points are scored; if incorrect, penalties may apply.
- **Winner:** The team wins by guessing the secret word; the Lie-brarian wins if the team fails or runs out of turns.

title: Fika
description:
Fika is a delightful two-player card game embodying the Swedish tradition of "fika," a moment for coffee and conversation. It offers a gentle, strategic experience where careful card play and observation lead to victory.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Collect valuable sets of cards for victory points.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Play a Card:** Play one or more cards from your hand.
    *   **Match and Collect:** Match cards by criteria (color, type) to collect them into your scoring pile.
    *   **Draw New Cards:** Refresh your hand from the draw pile.
*   **End Game:** The game ends when the draw pile is depleted and all hands are played.
*   **Winner:** The player with the highest score from collected sets wins.

title: Firefly Fluxx
description:
Firefly Fluxx brings the unpredictable, ever-changing rules of Fluxx to the beloved Firefly universe. This card game features constantly shifting rules, winning conditions, characters, and iconic items from the TV series. Its unique and highly replayable experience perfectly captures the quirky, chaotic nature of both Firefly and Fluxx.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
*   **Goal:** Fulfill the current "Goal" by having required "Keeper" cards in front of you.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Draw:** Draw cards according to the current "Draw" rule.
    *   **Play:** Play cards according to the current "Play" rule.
    *   **New Rules:** Play cards to change game rules, activate actions, gain Keepers, or trigger Creepers.
    *   **Discard:** Discard if Hand or Keeper limits are in play.
*   **Winner:** The first player to meet the conditions of the active Goal card(s).

title: Five Crowns
description:
Five Crowns is a unique five-suited rummy-style card game where players form books and runs with an ever-changing wild card and growing hand size. This classic game with a twist offers strategy, observation, and a bit of luck for all skill levels.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Have the lowest score after eleven rounds by forming books and runs.
*   **Each Round:**
    *   **Draw:** Take one card from the draw or discard pile.
    *   **Meld/Lay Off:** Form books (same rank) or runs (same suit, sequential) from hand —or onto existing melds.
    *   **Discard:** Place one card onto the discard pile.
*   **End Game:** The game ends after the eleventh round.
*   **Winner:** The player with the lowest total score across all eleven rounds wins.

This edition features a standard deck of 5-suited cards, offering dynamic and enjoyable gameplay for families and friends.

title: Flamecraft
description:
Flamecraft is a charming and strategic game where players are Flamekeepers, conversing with elemental dragons to bring prosperity to town shops. With delightful artwork, it offers a cozy yet engaging experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview

*   **Goal:** Become the most renowned Flamekeeper by accumulating reputation points.
*   **On Your Turn:**
    *   **Gather:** Move to an empty shop, collect goods, activate craft dragons, and optionally enchant.
    *   **Advertise:** Move to a shop with other Flamekeepers, gain goods, and activate one shop's "advertise" ability.
*   **End Game:** Triggered when the last fancy dragon is adopted or the last enchantment is drawn.
*   **Winner:** The Flamekeeper with the most reputation points.

This edition features stunning artwork and high-quality components for an immersive experience.

title: Flamecraft Duals
description:
Flamecraft Duals transports you to a charming artisan city, where you'll strategically place dragons and activate their abilities in a delightful two-player competition. This quick and engaging game offers a fresh take on the original's mechanics, focusing on head-to-head dragon-powered battles.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Score the most points by placing dragons, activating shops, and fulfilling objectives.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Place a Dragon:** Place a dragon into an available shop slot.
    - **Activate Shop Abilities:** Activate the ability of the shop with your dragon, plus adjacent shops.
    - **Gather Resources:** Collect resources from activated shops.
    - **Fulfill Objectives:** Complete an objective card if requirements are met.
- **Winner:** The player with the highest total score wins.

title: Flamecraft: Dragons & Dragons
description:
Flamecraft: Dragons & Dragons expands the beloved base game with new adorable hybrid dragons and strategic gameplay elements. Players become dragon trainers on fresh adventures, engaging with unique abilities and enriching the core Flamecraft experience.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Earn the most reputation by strategically placing dragons, gathering resources, and fulfilling enchantments.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Place Dragons:** Interact with new Hydragons for unique "fire up" abilities.
    - **Utilize New Shops:** Use the "Double Dragons" shop for dragon pairing bonuses.
    - **Engage with Upscale Cards:** Gift goods for powerful magical rewards when enchanting.
- **Winner:** The player with the most reputation points at the end of the game.

This expansion enhances the charming world of Flamecraft with new dragon types, shops, and enchanting opportunities.

title: Flamecraft: Dragons of the Past Promo Pack
description:
The Flamecraft: Dragons of the Past Promo Pack expands your enchanted world of artisan dragons and bustling shops. It gathers all previously released promotional content, offering new strategic options and fresh synergies for dedicated fans and new players.

## Quick Gameplay Overview
- **Goal:** Introduce variety and new strategic options to the core Flamecraft game.
- **On Your Turn:**
    - **Integrate Shops:** Replace/add 12 new Shop cards with unique abilities.
    - **Introduce Dragons:** Incorporate 6 Fresh Scale Dragon Artisan cards for unique powers.

This pack includes 12 new Shop cards and 6 Fresh Scale Dragon Artisan cards.
